website_summaries.verdict: The bass-heavy SOL Republic Amps HD In-Ear Headphones offer plenty of power without distortion, but there are several solid options in this crowded price range.
pros: Powerful audio performance with no distortion on deep bass tracks
Inline microphone and remote control for mobile devices
cons: Carrying case is a pet hair and dust magnet

customer_reviews.title: That's pretty much all these are good for
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these if you plan on moving around or being active with these in your ears, cord bump will be a huge annoyance. Also the buds are really heavy and will slouch after a while. The remote features and the mic does not work on my android phone which needs a type-c to aux converter. I only use these for when I'm doing stuff on my laptop and staying still. That's pretty much all these are good for, listening to music while not moving, which is fine because the sound quality is pretty good for the price I got them for $45.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Can't do much better
customer_reviews.text: Great price, very durable, blends in and does not draw attention to themselves. My only (small issue) is the connection of the chord to the jack is just a slight bit flimsy. I've already had some break up of sound but it's just been momentary and my assumption only is that it is due to this connection point. I'll keep an eye on it but for now I'm very happy with this purchase. I've traveled extensively in them, worked out in them, even slept in them and they are comfortable, durable, and all in a great piece of technology.
customer_reviews.author: woody125

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding in ear earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best in ear earbuds Sol has ever made. They sound great and are durable unlike so many of their other lines of in ear earbuds. As usual buy at your own risk because Sol is not known for their incredible customer service if you ever have a problem and need technical assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon E. Parker III

customer_reviews.title: They sound great but???
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is to difficult with the tape and small wire ties. Vacum packaging would work better. The pause and song foward buttons feel cheap like when pushed they may or may not work. I had to return these headphones once due to the pause button not working. That angered me. Not worth $40.0
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for... Don't get these
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for these headphones, but they do not measure up. The sound quality is fair, but not great. I've tried so many different brands and find you do get what you pay for. The more expensive earbuds have far superior sound quality. These will do for now, but I don't expect to use them long term. Also, using the control button to repeat or skip a song rarely works. 11/12/2014 Update: They just broke. The left earbud just fell completely apart. What a waste of money. When not in use I keep them in a storage bag. Another brand down the drain. Started with 3 stars, now down to 1. I'd give none if I could.
customer_reviews.author: LindalouCA

customer_reviews.title: Where's the sound coming from.....
customer_reviews.text: This is my secod pair of sol republic earbuds. Not because the first broke, but they got stolen. I love em. They're comfortable in my ears. The volume and power button on the cords is very convenient. But please note. If you leave your ear buds plugged into your ipod/phone/electronic device. The music can be turned on if the power button on the cord gets pressed. So, if you hear music coming faintly from somewhere..well there you go. I now always unplg it but for some people that could be a big pain in the rear. Sound is excellent. Price is very reasonable. I will continue to buy SOL.
customer_reviews.author: LiteraryChaos

customer_reviews.title: customer for life!
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best sounding headphones I have heard for the general listener. I bought them a little over a year ago and they have no signs of ware and still sound great! I work in a store that specializes in high end headphones and these murder a lot of headphones in the same price point and even the more expensive ones! I'll take these over a set of beats any day. The drivers are a little big but it doesn't bother me. 5 stars for sol republic on making these!
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: These were good while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: These were good while they lasted. Pretty good sound quality at this price range, though they're not durable. I only wear them on my daily commute to work, and do not exercise with them. They lasted me 6 months before the sound started cutting out and growing tinny. I claimed warranty through SOL Republic, who promptly replaced these with a brand new set pretty easily! Hoping those will last more than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: J. Law

customer_reviews.title: good product, bad service
customer_reviews.text: i'm not a audiophile, but i like the look and feel of these earphones. however, the earbuds seem to come off pretty easily. i've already had to use the replacement ear buds after a couple months of use, but i lost those as well because the earbuds just don't stay on very well. i contacted sol republic customer care on numerous occasions (through their call center # and email form on their site), since the "free ear tips for life" was a huge draw for me, but to this date i have yet to get ahold of anyone from customer care who can help me get these replacement eartips. so, product is great...service is pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Chief Complaint - Weak Cord
customer_reviews.text: I give this product two stars based on the fact that I've been through three pair in less than a year. The cord breaks at the jack quite easily. I keep the ear buds in a metal container to ensure safety when not in use. My device (phone/iPod) is in my pocket when in use with the ear buds. Other than that it is an amazing product based on sound quality. In my opinion the Sol ear buds surpass Bose in sound.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research on this product, and found good reviews, now that I have them I can let you know that they are great. The price is great, I got it for $69.99 here at Amazon; they were on sale for about 3 days but went back to $99. The only problem I encounter was that in some tracks the Base reproduction was too heavy (Like: Maroon 5 - One More Night) but that's because those tracks have already strong base. I recommend this ear-phones.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Beltran

customer_reviews.title: not a surprise but price is good
customer_reviews.text: i owned Sol Republic Headphone that has great bass and comfortable. it's the reason i bought this for a small size and for summer use. but sound is not comparable to the great HD headphone. it's ok but for the price ($3X), it is still good. i just don't want to spend $200 for some high brand because i often damage them by dropping into cup of coffee or just by sitting on them accidentally. it's ok for the price. not surprise. and for general use.
customer_reviews.author: Rita L.

customer_reviews.title: Ears Buds for Life?  Nope, I have tried and no luck.
customer_reviews.text: These don't sound bad but they have connectivity issues. Often the volume does not work. You have to repeatedly plug them in and remove them to get the volume to work. Earbuds for life? Not as far I can tell. I have ordered them 3 times and still no buds. I called the help number but they said they have not control over that, I'm guessing it's handled through some fulfillment house and they are not making it happen. Too Bad
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H. Ettel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you aren't going to find anything better. They sound amazing! I listen to my music all day with these. They are very comfortable and stylish. I saw in some reviews people were saying these headphones are built for IPhones. I find that not to be true. I have a windows phone and all the buttons and mic work just fine. Overall these are great headphones and I would definitely recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality of the earphones is great, but people seem to have a very difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of the earphones is great, but people seem to have a very difficult time hearing me when I use the inline mic; I have to hold it directly in front of my mouth, and even then I get complaints of muffled sound. Also, the earphones fit pretty well, but the plastic logo caps are kinda weird; I don't know whether they serve a purpose or are purely aesthetic, but they make the headphones seem bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelius Peffenfeffer

customer_reviews.title: The sound is pretty alright better than I expected honestly
customer_reviews.text: The sound is pretty alright better than I expected honestly, but if your volume is around half way or low you can hear the cable bouncing around and when the wire gets pulled at all they either do fall out or slip out enough for it to be uncomfortable and come out far enough to not seal in the sound, as I said the sound is good but they lack in a lot of areas
customer_reviews.author: Simon Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good buy...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones though they are hard to keep in the ear; but then I have never found any that would fit mine, maybe my ears are not meant for in-ear ones. Great sound and quality. I would've liked if they came with tangle-free cord as they do tangle very easily. But so far, using them daily and I have had no issue for more than 6 months. I must say that they were a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: AJKahn

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product for Its Price
customer_reviews.text: These pairs of earbuds lack the bass and clarity that you would hear from other higher-priced earbuds. The low cost does dictate what you get. It's not the worse but it's not the best. I would consider it mid-range earbuds. The plastic pieces under the earbuds broke off within 3 months of careful and consistent usage.
customer_reviews.author: Tram

customer_reviews.title: A let down
customer_reviews.text: They did at first but was a let down. The buds fit but becaus of the weight of the actual earbuds may and eventually fall out or get loss in your ears. After that the control buttons did not work at all after a month (did not come in contact tact with water or mouisture). So, now they're basic earbuds. The only upside is the continued product of music quality SOL REPUBLIC is known for.
customer_reviews.author: P. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Man, wow, I bought these a long ass time ago and I still have them, they still work and they still are high quality ear buds. Got a little battle scar on the button, but that still works too.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: First I will state that I use these quite often since they are the only IEM with a mic I own. I love my meelec m9's and so these don't compare as well in terms of being clear or engaging. Also, there is no option to swap to a neutral bass sounding tip. Since I paid 11.xx. I can not complain for what appeared to be a new product. They are an excellent upgrade from the horrible cheap models found in most stores.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: These just got in a bit ago. I tried them out only to find that the ear bud on the right is dead. If you jiggle the wire, it will crackle in and out a bit, but other than that, no sound comes out of it. Very disappointing. I am returning these now. On a side note, these would not stay in my ears regardless of the rubber adapter used, even though I was not moving around at all.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 7ish months
customer_reviews.text: They come out of your ear too often. They sound great on their own if you push 'em in correctly. Too bad it only sounds good for a bit until they come out! It's so frustrating. All of the cushion thingies that come with it are either too big or too small.
customer_reviews.author: Mig G

customer_reviews.title: not terrible but not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these and they were adequate. They worked... For like a month. Now the left speaker went out. The sound in these is not especially good and they are rather bulky for what they are. Even with the bigest earpiece on, they would not stop slipping out of my ears. To get them to stay, I would have to put the left one in my right ear and vice versa. These aren't utter garbage, but I would say that they are NOT worth the money. I am sick of paying $30 for headphones that break after a month
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Wilson

customer_reviews.title: good sound but bad durability
customer_reviews.text: I would give them a higher rating there sounds amazing. But not even a year goes by I treat them amazingly always store them in a nice safe place and the audio jack goes out just randomly when I'm walking to the store very ashamed at how audio jacks keep cutting out or getting weekend they need to really strengthen those because those seem to be the cornerstone of headphones failing on cutting out left or right ear it seems no matter the brand Dr Dre beats, SOL republic, monster, Sony, the audio jack seems to always go out
customer_reviews.author: Neopanman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym - still working over a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear at the gym with my iPhone and iPod. I was having issues with headphones falling out while I ran and stopping working after a few months. No complaints at all. They are not top of the line sound but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: JodiR

customer_reviews.title: My New Best Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit leary on purchasing these never really heard of them. I never knew that earbuds would bass more than on ear headphones but these do, they have that clear even sound not to much bass not to much hig but just right, I am going to purchase a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: pretty durable headphones
customer_reviews.text: These heaphones were by far the most durable I've had lasting 10 months. the left ear finally gave out after i jumbled it up and put it in my pocket. currently purchasing another set. The quality of the music is above standards and base is good
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item. honest buy.
customer_reviews.text: Sound was not as great or overly outstanding as I had expected but still good sound that is not too muffled by other sounds. They were used and in good condition, LIKE NEW. Gifted them to a brother who I owed a pair of headphones to and he liked them. Shipping was fast and packaging was just right. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Chee

customer_reviews.title: these headphones sound very nice highly recommend them to everyone that enjoys listening to ...
customer_reviews.text: these headphones sound very nice highly recommend them to everyone that enjoys listening to music the only drawback about these headphones is that I've experienced that hopefully no one else ends up dealing with my situation I had the pair of headphones for not even a month and one of the speaker's gave out but the good news is I called sol Republic and they told me that there going to give me a replacement pair free of charge and yes the official website has an option that gives you the ability to file a complaint if anything's wrong with your headphones via their website or other stores and even Amazon
customer_reviews.author: phillip

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, but weird in my ears
customer_reviews.text: I really love these. When the package arrived, the box was beaten up but the headphones were fine. These are really good headphones for the price. The bass is perfect and the high and mids are perfect. Why I give them 4/5 is because for me, I really hate how far these go into my ears. It just feels super weird and uncomfortable for these to be in your ears. But everything else it awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Austin M

customer_reviews.title: Extremely solid earphones!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought the SOL On-ear v10 sound engine headphone and loved them. Was in need for in ear and gave these a try due to the large satisfaction from the headphones. WOW! these are awesome. Ignore the people regarding they don't stay in your ears. This is why they make different size rubber tips. Of course they will fall out if they arent snug in your ears. I use the big rubber tips and they are great! probably will never buy a different set of earphones. Great bass and sound quality. A simple plug and play!
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!  Good Bass!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and durable. They have lasted me longer then any other ear bud I have ever owned. I have had these for over a year and they still work great. I ware these every day and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Lewis

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. Very good sound quality and the company is very helpful with any problems. I had a little sound defect and Sol Republic didn't hesitate to swap them for me
customer_reviews.author: Hauler

customer_reviews.title: Not For Everyone..
customer_reviews.text: These are more about user preferences. I found the ear buds a bit too invasive for my ears. The sound quality didn't feel all that different from the Earpods actually. Also, the mic and control set make the buds a bit too heavy for my liking. Definitely not for workouts.
customer_reviews.author: HellzVenom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality, I have powerbeats2 for training and better bass, but also better highs and mids, I also have sennheiser over ears and they are nearly as good, I use comfort fit tips with them to get them to hold on and block out more ambient noise, great in ears, was very surprised when I got them just for listening while I'm in bed
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Webb

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Cons: To me not loud enough Pros: Good design, clear sound, nice bass Overall: I'm coming from the Sol Republic Track HDs which are great so I bought these and I like them very good in ear headphones, I can't compare them to Beats as I've never wanted a pair of them because everyone else has them, but I can compare them to a K-mart/Sears brand Alphaline where I bought all of their headphones on sale for a combines $10 bucks & the in-ear with mic pair to me sound better then these Amps but I like the Sol Republic Amps I'd recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Sol Republic 1102-61earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I love my music, but I'm no ear bud snob. I've had bad ones and so so, and these are better than that. The highs and mids are okay, and there's a little extra bass I think. I'm happy with that, but getting used to how they feel is going to take awhile. Haven't had occasion to use the mic yet
customer_reviews.author: ct1156

customer_reviews.title: Never again, SOL REPUBLIC.
customer_reviews.text: These are huge - about half of them stick out of my ears. The L/R is marked very poorly, with faded silver letters on the INSIDE of each earbud. The sound is very average, even worse than my 10 year old $15 Sony earbuds. No wonder they don't list any specs on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Iggy

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound had read some reviews about the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent sound had read some reviews about the fact that it falls off but most ear buds fall off at some point this particular set have a powerful and clear sound highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headset with great value.
customer_reviews.text: The product is wonderful. Great sound clarity in bass n treble. The wire is not the longest but still reasonable. I'm not a huge fan of the one button control but it's all about the audio to me. Huge volume n loudness. Definitely recommend. Since this original 5 star review the headset has already crapped out on me. #lame I recently purchased a Sony extrabass headset for 50 bucks and it's way better then the sol headset in every way.
customer_reviews.author: superat169

customer_reviews.title: Great Earbuds....While they last
customer_reviews.text: I paid 25 dollars for these and they lasted about 3 months, so I can't complain too much especially considering that's the price of the basic apple earbuds and those have awful sound. These sound fantastic and the bass is loud and clear. As for their quality, its very sound (haha puns) and solid. I bet that stuffing these in my pocket day after day had an effect on how long these lasted and I bet if you take perfect care of them they will last forever. Very comfortable and blocked all outside noise and they do not leak at all!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Sick headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sound is really good. I'm not an expert but it plays all my favs very well (ex. Hip-Hop, EDM, Alternative). Only gripe is on occasion the bud falls out pretty easily. Other times completely sturdy. (- 1/2 star) Aesthetically very pleasing. I wish the button box was metallic too (-1/2 star) Blocks out all other noise pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: George Trusca

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Definitely recommended if your looking for a very good quality sound, not only one of the best but a topnotch earphone in this price range. CONS: Not recommended for those on the go, running, etc. as its creates an irritating sounds once the cord scratches any surface. OVERALL: its worth your penny on this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Angelo Abalos

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Great look
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 16 yr old daughter who doesnt like the headphones look. She absolutely loves them. I will say the in cord feature only works with apple products and the sound is not as great if not using apple hardware. Very minimal sounds leakage. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great. The sound is super for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The sound is super for the price paid. The shape of the bud was a bit awkward at first but once I got used to it I have grown to really enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: listentoyourheart

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, just wish I could control the volume with the controls
customer_reviews.author: Adam Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Just as described. The sound quality is amazing. The bass is clear and all the tones are clear. I love the buttons on the cord to be able to increase or decrease volume without having to go into my pocket to turn it down from my iPod.
customer_reviews.author: asap1082

customer_reviews.title: Best Prime Deal
customer_reviews.text: $70 headphones for $20, you can't beat that deal! The sound quality is definitely top shelf and they fit so snug and sound. Please a 1 year warranty for each pair, nice offer with each pair.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Love these so much
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a pair of these and loved them but I sadly lost them at the gym. I decided to order another pair because I love that even when I am running they stay in my ears. They have great sounds and are a quality ear bud. Would recommend them to anyone looking for new ear buds!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Douglas Brinton

customer_reviews.title: couldve been  better
customer_reviews.text: Could be better.The sound is very hollow and lacks what original i4 sound engine offered very disappointed since i thought these companies like sol really cared about people's wants in sound quality.my money is not worth for these hollow sounding headphones.the original amps were the best.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Value for money and Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a super value-for-money earphones. The fit is snug and keeps environmental noise out. Sound reproduction is excellent except the highs are too high for me. A stronger bass would also make this perfect. The mic works perfectly with my Apple products.
customer_reviews.author: Pug

customer_reviews.title: broke in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Had them less than a month and only used em a couple times and it shorted out on me. I expected it to happen within the 6 mo to a year mark like all headphones but less than a month?! I barely used them. I think ill go back to skull candy
customer_reviews.author: jerrodlay

customer_reviews.title: They fit me fine and sound alright There worth it for 20 dollars ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit me fine and sound alright There worth it for 20 dollars but the MSRP they were at is a complete rip off
customer_reviews.author: Noor K.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper phone work just as well.
customer_reviews.text: These earhones worked a 29 days then the left one did no work. Wanted to send them back but the following day was 30 days too late. The plug would not fit my ears either. But they did change over when i had a phone call.
customer_reviews.author: jayjay

customer_reviews.title: At 58 my ears aren't near perfect. These in-ear headphones fit securely and seal tightly
customer_reviews.text: At 58 my ears aren't near perfect. These in-ear headphones fit securely and seal tightly, I've wore throughout the day at work without discomfort. One of my favorite sets, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: fredleep

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a week or two.
customer_reviews.text: Not really that good sounding. Most important, broke after less than two weeks. The right earpiece cuts out. Seems like there is a bad connection @ the mic. Honestly, the last three sets of headphones i have had failed similarly. I just didn't expect this to happen in less than two weeks. Definitely avoid.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds on the market
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sound, the best I have heard out of earbuds. They are a little big if you want something compact and low profile, but the quality is much better and the price can't be beat. The tangle-resustant cord had only tangled when I tied it, and the silicon carrying pouch that comes with them is very handy for storing them and the spare buds. Overall, A+ Sol Republic, wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Riley

customer_reviews.title: BEST YET!
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased these buds as I own the tracks as well. I use these for cellphone covos mostly. Great sound quality in my opinion and are very durable!! Honestly I've kept a pair of these for over a year now. Longest I've ever owned a pair of ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: Not durable at all. They broke at the bud so the rubber doesn't stay and the silver speaker thing fell off. They did work at first very well.
customer_reviews.author: N. T

customer_reviews.title: I think the cheaper JAX have a better sound, they certainly have more bass
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of SOL headphones. I have previously bought the JAX and after two pair breaking (one side would stop working) after a short amount of time I thought I would give these a try. I think the cheaper JAX have a better sound, they certainly have more bass. This will be my last SOL product.
customer_reviews.author: JHC

customer_reviews.title: Not particularly amped...
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the Amps In-Ear model, black. I'm a SOL Republic fan, having owned their Tracks HD's for a time, which are excellent on-ear headphones. These, however, don't have the same punchiness to recommend them. They sound like any old earbuds of $20-plus quality range. Build quality is alright, nothing special, however. I personally have grown to find in-ear phones inferior, and now prefer a set of on- or over-ear headphones, such as the Tracks HD's (around $100). Given the quality of the Tracks, I thought these might be a cut above similar in-ear choices, but I decided ultimately to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D. Lossing

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Perfect balance between base and vocal. These SOL REPUBLIC AMPS are really great, and fit just perfect in my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Only had them for a short period of time. Bought them to use with my windows phone but aren't compatible, which was listed on the description. Free ear buds for life tho so cant beat that.
customer_reviews.author: johnk

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, cord connection to adapter could be stronger though.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. These unfortunately are my second pair as the cord came apart from the adapter on my first pair. Love SOL Republic products though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice with a couple of setbacks
customer_reviews.text: They're great headphones only they have a small variety for ear buds. The music sounds great. Only reason I give them 4 stars is because they feel cheaply built and they are pretty big and the lack of earbud sizes
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G.

customer_reviews.title: So Good I'm Buying Another!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable sound! Definitely will order another set. Wow! you can hear every background instrument and the words that are being sung. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Randall Todd Allen

customer_reviews.title: I think this 900 have the best sound for on the ear type
customer_reviews.text: I am a music sound tech. I think this 900 have the best sound for on the ear type. How long they last as far as wear and tear, i don't know yet This have better sound than Dre Beats. I know, because i bought them and this sound so much better and this are much cheeper. Albert Valle
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Sound good, really good, one of my sisters, loooove it, it was a gift for her, and she likes it. it arrives in perfect time, in perfect conditions and i have no complaint,
customer_reviews.author: Kathyusca

customer_reviews.title: They sound great and isolate noise completely. I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I got was defective (only one ear worked). That was on Dec 19th. I filed a defective return and had another pair by Dec 23rd - before Christmas! I was really surprised that they got a replacement out so quickly during Christmastime.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas A. Liechty

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 17 year old brother for his birthday and he definitely enjoyed the quality of speakers, but he doesn't realize I got them for such a great price ;)
customer_reviews.author: KEYTRAVIS80

customer_reviews.title: Clarity and exceptional quality!
customer_reviews.text: Another great Sol Republic headphone for those who love their bass, and music in general! I now own every in ear headphone that they make! Try these and see what you're missing!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to return them My original iphone`s headphones sounds better, especially bass
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: My son loved these headphones
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these headphones, but after a while they started to sound as if they were being used underwater; returned the first pair and received another pair only to have the same thing happen. Returned them for a completely different type of headphones. I do have to say the company worked with me without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lynn McCall

customer_reviews.title: they are not comfortable to wear because of the weight pulling down
customer_reviews.text: Too much external weight on the headphones, they are not comfortable to wear because of the weight pulling down.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Jones

customer_reviews.title: I don't really like how these fit
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like how these fit. Due to their shape, they fall out of my ears and don't fit in them very well to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: A headphone more to practical use than aesthetic.
customer_reviews.text: Love this headphone. As was promised the bass and clarity of this product sounds great to me every way. If I need to point out one flaw, it has to be the piece on the back with Sol Republic logo. Once you get the real product it doesn't exactly look like what's on the picture. It's a bit too big compared to the rest...But if you aren't that aesthetic kind of guy then it's a perfect fit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Q.

customer_reviews.title: Product defect
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is off the charts, bass is incredible, broke 3 hours after using them
customer_reviews.author: Alex Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound and design
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound and design - but the microphone will not work with the Samsung Galaxy Note. I would suspect that the 3.5mm plug is apple wired and does not work for Androids.
customer_reviews.author: D KW

customer_reviews.title: Great High, Mids, and lows
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of headphones. The only downfall IMO is the design. They tend to stick out of my ears a little too much, but overall im still happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: CenCali21

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I got them as a replacement for some stolen power beats. I wanted them mainly for the gym and something that had a good microphone. The buds stay in my ears well and they produce a great sound. They don't stay in as well as the power beats since they don't have something to go over the ear but they're not bad. The clear sound that comes out of them is the best part. They don't hurt my ears even during long wear times. For $80 vice the $130 for the power beats I'm pleased, just wish they had an attachment that went over the ear, then they'd be a 5 star item.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best ear buds I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best ear buds I have ever used. Mic could still be improved, but these are the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The outside part was too large to fit comfortably in my ear
customer_reviews.text: The outside part was too large to fit comfortably in my ear. The tips weren't great either, didn't have a size that fits in one of my ears. I like the cheaper versions of these, they sound great and aren't trying to hard to look like expensive earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Curran

customer_reviews.title: Don't last
customer_reviews.text: Terrible I know that there are some good reviews but I only had these for one month and one side has already burnt out
customer_reviews.author: Emilio Javier Salamanca

customer_reviews.title: Sound is decent. Support is great, but Form factor STINKS!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE in ear earphones, but SOL slapped this big conical piece of plastic on the back on the driver. That's right that big flat round piece has NOTHING to do with sound, its purely cosmetic and makes it harder get a good fit due to the size, weight and angle of that back piece. Also, that back piece broke one, which SOL was very kind to replace at no cost, but that's when I figured out that it's purely cosmetic. The wire passes through it but that's it. I think if they could consider the fit more carefully, these would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: It's fine didn't really see anything thing different about the sound ...
customer_reviews.text: It's fine didn't really see anything thing different about the sound quality only more bass I expect more from a 170 dollar earbuds but meh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheaper and sounds better then the beats if you ask me.
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace them after two months but works perfectly....
customer_reviews.author: Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Clear and well defined sound. The output is little less compared to other headphone (i bought a skullcandy which has better output than this). Fits ears well. Microphone pics the sound really well. Worth the pennies spent.
customer_reviews.author: Sundaravadivel N

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is not that great as it doesnt go well in to the ear canal. May be its my ears or the design. :) Happy with the sound quality and worththe money
customer_reviews.author: Komatineni

customer_reviews.title: completely horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Quality under what I was hoping for, delicate and fragile as well they are no longer working after just a few months, completely horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Grimilenn

customer_reviews.title: The earbuds are great; sound-wise and convinience-wise
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds are great; sound-wise and convinience-wise. The only thing that bothers me, is the weirdly proportionate bod of the bud. The circle is way bigger in real life than in these pics. Little smaller than the penny. But otherwise flawless
customer_reviews.author: Zoji Bomya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in ear headphones especially considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in ear headphones especially considering the price. I use them at the gym and they are very lightweight and cancel outside noise very well. The sound clarity is also very good with decent bass. If your looking for all around solid headphones for a good price sol republic is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: K Noisewater

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: worked for the 1st hour then the sound kept going in and out. Will be returning these, really wanted to like these
customer_reviews.author: kenyan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They tend to fall out due to the disk being too heavy but the sound quality was quite impressive.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: broke to quickly
customer_reviews.text: Broke right after the return deadline. Did play great just doesn't last long whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Sol Republic
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting different sound as I had used a different pair of sols. Also, the big things on the ear buds are kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: snizzsyrup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. they lasted two kayaking trips and 2 rounds in the dryer
customer_reviews.author: Dman

customer_reviews.title: One of the best.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is realistic, and the fit is perfect. I would recommend this to anyone who is in search of a lightweight and stylish headset.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: great sound..big bulky
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. But are a bit big. So good for sitting & listening...airplane or at desk. But, not for workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Fly Fish 6

customer_reviews.title: Super headphones! These headphones have lasted my kids longer ...
customer_reviews.text: Super headphones! These headphones have lasted my kids longer than Beats or Monster.
customer_reviews.author: T. DiGuilio

product_meta.title: SOL REPUBLIC 1101-31 AMPS In-Ear Headphones with Free Ear Tips for Life - Blac
product_meta.description: Size:Amps (3-Button)| Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingSol Republic's 1101-31 AMPS In-Ear Headphones with Free Ear Tips for Life, in black, feature i4 sound engine speakers. These in-ear headphones are designed to deliver incredible sound, style and technology. With powerful sound you can feel, AMPS are fully loaded with deep bass and high clarity. The curved, in-ear Stay Fit design matches the ear's natural shape and a right angle connector makes sure the cable does not break. The 3-button mic + music control lets you adjust the volume, pause/resume/skip music and answer/hang-up calls. Plus the high clarity mic captures every word possible.
feature_bullets: i4 sound engine speakers for deep bass and high clarity
Engineered with angle shafts that mirror the natural shape of the ear
Four sizes of ear tips ensure you get a comfortable fit, with a perfect seal and enhanced noise isolation
Compatible with most Apple, Android and Windows devices that uses a 3.5mm jack

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars472 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
